content.rendered:
The Office of Financial Aid supports all students to ensure an affordable University of La Verne education.

Learn more about aid available for your academic program :

  • Aid for Traditional Undergraduate Students
  • Aid for Transfer Students
  • Aid for Accelerated Undergraduate Programs
  • Aid for Graduate Students

How to Apply for Financial Aid

Applying for Financial Aid at the La Verne is easy!

It all starts with completing your FAFSA.
La Verne’s School Code is 00121600

Learn more about applying here!

Connect With Us

Our experienced counselors are available to assist you if you have questions or need help!
